title: Matt Shadows from Avenged Sevenfold
itunes:title: Matt Shadows from Avenged Sevenfold
description:
In this episode we sit down with the vocalist of Avenged Sevenfold, Matt Shadows. We review new records from Cold Cave, Rise Against and Trap Them as well as the movie Battle: LA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
